title: Stories of Haiti
description: In the midst of an earlier crisis, Haitian author Edwidge Danticat reminds us of the contributions of Haiti's vibrant culture and people. This reading offers a timely message for today -- as the nation struggles in the aftermath of a devastating earthquake.
author: Edwidge Danticat
keywords: TED, talks, disaster relief, novel, poetry, storytelling, books
